title: Fake News: Man Did NOT Beat Little Brother After He Found Him Masturbating During "No Nut November" | Lead Stories
subtitle: Did 21-year-old Sergio Lopez from Albuquerque get arrested for beating up his little brother after he found him masturbating while...
author: leadstories.com
vclaim:
Did 21-year-old Sergio Lopez from Albuquerque get arrested for beating up his little brother after he found him masturbating while taking part in the "No Nut November" internet challenge? No, that's not true: the story was made up by a notorious "fauxtire" website that makes up tales about bizarre crimes and weird sex acts but purely for entertainment purposes. It did not happen for real.

The story originated from an article published by HMedia on November 2, 2018 titled "Man Beats Little Brother After He Found Him Masturbating During "No Nut November"" (archived here) which opened:

Users on social media only saw this title, description and thumbnail so some of them might have thought it was a real news article:

Man Beats Little Brother After He Found Him Masturbating During "No Nut November" ALBUQUERQUE - Sergio Lopez, 21, has been arrested after he allegedly "beat the sh*t" out of his little brother after he walked in on him masturbating. According to officials, Sergio claimed that it was "no nut november" and that he couldn't let his little brother fail on the first day of the month. "I did ...

"No Nut November" is an internet challenge where the goal is not to masturbate during the month of November:

However the picture illustrating the story is not of anyone named "Sergio Lopez" but it appears to be the mugshot of a "SERGIO GIOVANY RANGEL" who was apparently arrested for cocaine possesion according to this website:

Huzlersmedia is a sister site of "fauxtire" website Huzlers.com, using the same adverstising tags and being promoted through the same Facebook pages. It carries a disclaimer at the bottom of the page which reads:

So you probably shouldn't believe anything on the page...
